titleStmt.title: A Declaration from the harmless & innocent people of God called Quakers against all sedition, plotters & fighters in the world, for the removing of the ground of jealousie and suspition from both magistrates and people in the kingdome concerning wars and fightings.

A Declaration from the harmless & innocent people of God called Quakers against all sedition, plotters & fighters in the world, for the removing of the ground of jealousie and suspition from both magistrates and people in the kingdome concerning wars and fightings.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Fox by Wing, but other eds. show signatures of eleven others besides Fox.
From page [1] at end: "Added in the reprinting. Courteous reader, This was our testimony above twenty years ago, and since then we have not been found acting contrary to it, nor ever shall ... ."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
